video.title: Miss XV
video.synopsis: Valentina and Natalia are planning their 15th birthday party, but the upcoming event mixed with typical teen drama put their friendship to the test.

episodes.synopsis: Vale and Nats dream about their 15th birthday presents. They wake up in chemistry class, and Vale pulls a prank, but not without consequences.
episodes.title: Sweet Sixteen

episodes.synopsis: After the video from the party, everyone starts calling Niko "Pinky". Leonora just makes it worse. Leonora leaves and Niko declares his love to Val.
episodes.title: El rosadito

episodes.synopsis: Alexis challenges Niko to fight for Vale's love. Niko wants Vale to be his girlfriend, but she says she just likes him as a friend.
episodes.title: Reto por amor

episodes.synopsis: Vale feels bad for what she did, especially since her parents are throwing her a big 15th birthday party. She tries to hide it by wearing gloves.
episodes.title: Apagón

episodes.synopsis: Marina takes Nats and Vale to a boutique where she's organized a fashion show with 15th birthday party dresses ending in a party.
episodes.title: En la boutique

episodes.synopsis: Marina and Sebastián organize a birthday party for Nats, but Vale's party is the same day. Marina wants to hold Nats's party at the Royal Palace.
episodes.title: Lucha por el palacio real

episodes.synopsis: Marina needs a simple girl for her shampoo commercial. Nats and Vale pick three girls out, but it doesn't work out. Vale tells Nats she could do it.
episodes.title: Modelos de comercial

episodes.synopsis: Vale shows up with orange hair. Marina isn't happy. She says Leonora will do the ad. Nats and Vale decide to celebrate their 15th birthday together.
episodes.title: Nueva modelo

episodes.synopsis: In the Café de Camilo grand opening, Leonora gives Niko a tea, but he loses his voice. Vale manages to get Bobby Bueno to listen to her sing.
episodes.title: Inauguración

episodes.synopsis: Bobby Bueno likes Eddy's voice and gives him a contract to sign, but Nats says he should read it first. Camilo and Magos fall in love at first sight.
episodes.title: Contrato musical

episodes.synopsis: Vale and Niko start a secret relationship. Leonora goes to the school to study with Vale and Nats; there they meet Lula, a pinky-emo darky girl.
episodes.title: Pinky emo darky

episodes.synopsis: Eddy's singing a different tune under a new stage name. Nats and Vale make a guest list for their party, but Leonora mistakenly blasts it to everyone.
episodes.title: Rocko tek

episodes.synopsis: Magos asks Vale if she has anything to do with Debbie's party. Nats has feelings for Rocko Tek and Eddy. Alexis asks Eddy to help him plan his date.
episodes.title: Entre dos amores

episodes.synopsis: Nats and Vale give Lula some great news about her pinky-emo darky 15th birthday party. Pato visits Niko to tell him he'll give him Bobby Bueno's info.
episodes.title: Revelaciones

episodes.synopsis: Nats tells Vale she can't hide anything from her, so she'll tell her a secret. Alexis threatens Vale that he'll tell everyone she's a big fat liar.
episodes.title: Sospechas o celos

episodes.synopsis: Lula's party is super goth. Niko thinks he's cursed; something bad always happens when he sings. Alexis asks Leonora for the video of Debbie's party.
episodes.title: Mala suerte

episodes.synopsis: The Pinkikis try to get under Nats's skin saying she won't look like a member of Vale's family. Marina receives a phone call and Nats answers.
episodes.title: Falsa familia

episodes.synopsis: The competition is coming up, and Nats asks Marina to go see her. Alexis plans to appear in Vale's dance number. Val and Nats fight during rehearsals.
episodes.title: Intercolegiales

episodes.synopsis: Nats confronts Vale over the school competition. Nats wants to win the 15th birthday party. Vale is happy; she has her life dream back.
episodes.title: Sueños recuperados

episodes.synopsis: Marina cancels Nats's 15th birthday party. Nats asks Niko if he wants to be on her team for the competition; Alexis overhears and says he's with Vale.
episodes.title: BFFs de nuevo

episodes.synopsis: Nats and Val asks the Miss XV producers if they can enter the competition together. Vale tells Magos she's started a band. Niko is happy to be in it.
episodes.title: Nueva banda

episodes.synopsis: Alexis tells Pato that Val asked him for a speech for the competition. Nats and Val try to write a speech, but they can't come up with any ideas.
episodes.title: Discursos

episodes.synopsis: Eddy gets his first real job. Lea tells Nats and Val that they need a rehearsal space. Nats is surprised that Vale likes Alexis now.
episodes.title: Celos ocultos

episodes.synopsis: Nats tells the Pinkikis that her new boyfriend is so cute and theyll die of envy when they see him. Val tells Nats Alexis asked for a second chance.
episodes.title: Nuevos sentimientos

episodes.synopsis: Vale reminds everyone their first audition at Miss XV is coming up. The band is disqualified after only 5 of the 6 registered members show up.
episodes.title: Primera audición

episodes.synopsis: Vale watches Nats's vlog and is surprised to find a video of Niko and Leonora kissing. Nats's plan is going perfectly; she's got Renata off her back.
episodes.title: Plan de venganza

episodes.synopsis: Nats hasn't studied, so she cheats on the test. When she drops her cheat sheet, she puts the blame on someone else. Leonora plays the victim with Val.
episodes.title: Acordeón

episodes.synopsis: Niko is having trouble on the team because of Alexis. Alexis and Pato come up with a plan. Nats confesses to Val that she told the director the truth.
episodes.title: Troll

episodes.synopsis: Fabián is constantly traveling because of his father's work and has no friends. Niko asks Leonora what she really feels for him. Benito runs away.
episodes.title: Travesuras de benito

episodes.synopsis: Val has a dilemma. She knows that if Eddy starts going to the school she'll have her party, but if he doesn't, she'll have more time with Niko.
episodes.title: Dilema de quinceanera

episodes.synopsis: Eddy is still jealous of Fabián; he can't believe he's going out with Nats. Alexis plans to get revenge on Niko, and Pato agrees to help.
episodes.title: Eddy celoso

episodes.synopsis: Nats sees Eddy at school and asks him what he's doing there. He replies that he's a student there now. Renata threatens to make Eddy's life difficult.
episodes.title: Nuevos alumnos

episodes.synopsis: Niko tells Vale if she's really his friend, she has to help him get expelled from the school. Alexis needs to get everyone together to confront Niko.
episodes.title: Niko rebelde

episodes.synopsis: Alexis and Niko conspire to separate their parents. Camilo and Magos's designs will be featured in a fashion show, and Vale and Leonora will model.
episodes.title: Desfile de modas

episodes.synopsis: Renata tells Eddy to drop the ego. Dosberto can't believe Eddy is back with the witch. Leonora tells her friends that Magos's dress has arrived.
episodes.title: Modelo estrella

episodes.synopsis: Lula says Leonora has been acting strangely. Eddy and Nats take a photo together, and Renata jealously confronts him. Nats notices Eddy smells bad.
episodes.title: Apeste escolar

episodes.synopsis: Leonora can't find Benito and asks Pato if he lost him. There's one more audition before entering the competition, but there's only room for one.
episodes.title: Nueva prueba

episodes.synopsis: Dosberto tells Eddy he stinks because of Renata. Vale promises not to get mad at Nats, but Leonora is trying to cause trouble again.
episodes.title: Amistad en riesgo

episodes.synopsis: The Archis threaten Niko, who says they can do whatever they want. Pato forgives Catalina after the accident. Catalina says something to upset Niko.
episodes.title: El dilema de niko

episodes.synopsis: The next challenge on Miss XV is announced, and it has nothing to do with music. Vale and Nats miss each other and become best friends forever again.
episodes.title: Espías

episodes.synopsis: Eddy moves on from Renata and her schemes. Vale tells Manzanita she met a super-cute boy. Niko is looking for someone named Nobody Knows Who I Am.
episodes.title: Nadie sabe quien soy

episodes.synopsis: Eddy forbids Miguel from seeing Natalia. Vale asks Camilo for Magos; she wants to see the dress Dominique ordered. Leonora asks Alexis for help.
episodes.title: La princesa más princesa

episodes.synopsis: Dosberto hopes to get back together with Renata. Vale becomes a fan of the cyberworld. Alexis tells Pato he's going to school wearing a new fragrance.
episodes.title: Mundo cibernético

episodes.synopsis: Natalia invites Miguel home to dinner. Valentina tells Manzanita she'll finally meet "no one knows who I am". Niko overhears their conversation.
episodes.title: Identidad desconocida

episodes.synopsis: Nats tells Miguel not to lie to try to make it better. Leonora promises Pato they'll be together soon. Niko will finally meet the love of his life.
episodes.title: Esperanzas para Pato

episodes.synopsis: Pato asks Leonora to be his girlfriend. Eddy asks the Pinkikis whether they like other guys; he wants to know who they think is cute.
episodes.title: Nuevo galán

episodes.synopsis: Eddy misses flirting with the girls. Leonora knows Pato has a secret; she threatens him and tells him she'll make his life miserable until he tells.
episodes.title: Presidenta del comité de alumnos

episodes.synopsis: Nats tells Miguel the debate is today and she forgot to write her speech. Val is mad at Alexis for what he did to Nats. Alexis is happy Vale won.
episodes.title: Aún hay amor

episodes.synopsis: Vale asks Niko for another chance. Pato has the crown at his house. The Pinkikis tell Nats she was great. The school election winners are announced.
episodes.title: Nueva presidenta

episodes.synopsis: It seems like no matter what Alexis does, he always gets punished. Niko finds Benito. Miguel practices so he can talk to Natalia without stuttering.
episodes.title: Debut de lady venenosa

episodes.synopsis: Val tells Magos that Alexis wants her to be his girlfriend. Nats is ready to tell him she's always loved him and she never wants to be with another.
episodes.title: Confesión de amor

episodes.synopsis: Leonora tells Pato she's with Niko. Val is very hurt that they're together and hopes she never sees them kissing. Nats tells Eddy she's left Miguel.
episodes.title: Nueva oportunidad

episodes.synopsis: Eddy needs money to keep Paula happy. Manzanita moves forward with her plan to get between Leonora and Niko. Paula writes Vale a revealing letter.
episodes.title: Plan mejor como amigo

episodes.synopsis: The pinkikis find an announcement on the wall at school, and Renata is surprised. Paula promises Leonora feels bad for what she did.
episodes.title: Carta reveladora

episodes.synopsis: Vale asks Paula what she meant by the letter she left her. Nats tells Val that Eddy is in big trouble. Alexis is tired of Valentina's indifference.
episodes.title: Harto de la indeferencia

episodes.synopsis: Eddy tells Dosberto he hates school. There's a new challenge in the Miss XV competition, and Nats and Val will have to organize a rock and roll party.
episodes.title: Fiesta rockera

episodes.synopsis: No one shows up to the excess-themed party. Val thinks Leonora is handing out the invitations. Niko doesn't want to go unless he's personally invited.
episodes.title: Sin invitados

episodes.synopsis: Alexis and Pato are missing Val and Nats's party. Leonora won't let Niko go support his friends at the party. Alexis pushes his boundaries with Vale.
episodes.title: Nuevo chantaje

episodes.synopsis: Renato Gil is Niko's new agent. Leonora confronts Pato and asks him if he copied the crown and gave her a fake one. Val has something to say to Nats.
episodes.title: Nuevo representante

episodes.synopsis: Eddy gives Nats a great idea for her mother's campaign. Niko tells Leonora it isn't working out. Nats wonders what's going on between Alexis and Vale.
episodes.title: Posible truene

episodes.synopsis: Nats and Val are looking for the boy of the year, someone talented, popular and trustworthy. Eddy really wants to win. Vale won't let Alexis compete.
episodes.title: Chico del año

episodes.synopsis: Nats thought Vale would be on her side in the campaign. Niko doesn't want anyone to cheat on his behalf, but Leonora has a plan to help him win.
episodes.title: Alta calificacion

episodes.synopsis: Nats and Vale think up a plan to finish with the gossip in the competition. Alexis tells Valentina he doesn't need any more of her help to win.
episodes.title: Chismes de concurso

episodes.synopsis: Alexis tells Valentina that they're looking for her. Val can't believe what's happening to her. Leonora tells Niko that all this is Vale's doing.
episodes.title: Preguntas de chantaje

episodes.synopsis: Valentina is always sticking her nose in other people's business. She thinks she has the right video of Nats's parents, but she doesn't.
episodes.title: Video equivocado

episodes.synopsis: Alexis won't forgive Pato after messing with Vale and Nats's albums. Dosberto tells Leonora Vale's been expelled, but Nats has a plan to save her.
episodes.title: Plan anti-expulsión

episodes.synopsis: After the blackout, Vale wants to fix everything. Alexis can't stand the whole brotherly friendly comical magical musical thing between Vale and Niko.
episodes.title: Premiación y despedida

episodes.synopsis: Leonora's agent Rose isn't working with her anymore. Upset, Richi asks Vale to stop pretending and asks her to tell everyone the truth.
episodes.title: Ze toda la verdad

episodes.synopsis: Paula is about to tell Niko the whole truth. Eddy and Nats decide to try dating. Paula arrives at Natalia's house to talk with her, to her surprise.
episodes.title: Paula regresa

episodes.synopsis: Niko is about to return to the stage. Leonora does what she does for Niko out of love. Alexis, Pato and Leonora are in trouble because of Martina.
episodes.title: En problemas

episodes.synopsis: Vale confronts Alexis for daring to pretend he's Nobody Knows Who I Am. Miss XV inform Nats and Vale that only one birthday girl can be the winner.
episodes.title: Sólo una quinceañera

episodes.synopsis: Nats asks Eddy for a funny pic. Pato hears someone threatened Leonora in the competition. Vale knows the truth about Leonora and wants an explanation.
episodes.title: Explicaciones de Leonora

episodes.synopsis: Nats is jealous of Eddy, as the sports clothing campaign is bringing him a lot of fans. Leonora is hysterical after Niko leaves her.
episodes.title: Nats celosa

episodes.synopsis: Griselda, Pato's grandmother, returns. Pato has a surprise for Leonora. Leonora tells the school that Vale is going abroad on a permanent vacation.
episodes.title: Intercambio escolar

episodes.synopsis: Leonora tells Rómulo she's chosen a candidate for the student exchange program. Eddy is upset because a fan club is making him look bad.
episodes.title: Candidato de intercambio

episodes.synopsis: Max is the new foreign exchange student. Niko wants to check on something at the Miss XV competition. Alexis is jealous of Max and Valentina.
episodes.title: Nuevo contrincante

episodes.synopsis: Nats can't stop thinking about Max, she's really starting to like him. Niko confronts Max and makes it clear they are not friends.
episodes.title: Nat piensa en Max

episodes.synopsis: Nats wants to know whether Max is enjoying the party, but he replies he likes her more. Vale can't find her ring. Niko confronts Max.
episodes.title: Sin explicaciones

episodes.synopsis: Val is furious for what Niko's done, and Eddy can tell. Max asks Dosberto to do him a huge favor. Eddy goes to Nats's house and asks who she's seeing.
episodes.title: Celos Eddy

episodes.synopsis: Max decides to throw a party at his house. Niko's plans against Max are going perfectly, but Dosberto has other ideas. Nats can't keep folling Val.
episodes.title: Fiesta Max

episodes.synopsis: Vale feels bad about the kiss misunderstanding and tells Niko it's all her fault. Max asks Niko to help him find a job. Natalia isn't over Max.
episodes.title: Niko culpable

episodes.synopsis: Eddy is upset about Max's kissing Natalia. Leonora tells Pato that Max is behaving better and better. He says there's something she needs to know.
episodes.title: Invitación rechazada

episodes.synopsis: Alexis asks Valentina's parents to let her go to Antonieta's party with him. Max finds Vale with Nats. Pato is surprised to see Lula.
episodes.title: Fiesta de Antonieta

episodes.synopsis: Nats finds Val and Max talking, and she asks her boyfriend why they both looked so surprised to see her. Something goes missing at GreenLand School.
episodes.title: Revisión escolar

episodes.synopsis: Leonora is afraid she'll get expelled from school over the pen issue. Niko doesn't want to play basketball with Max. The Archies ask him to join them.
episodes.title: Niko y los Mirreyes

episodes.synopsis: Eddy and Dosberto decide to make a fool of Max at the basketball game to get him to leave Nats and Renata alone. Max's team and Pato's team face off.
episodes.title: Partido de basketball

episodes.synopsis: Max gets hurt at the basketball game and swears he took a fall, but Alexis doesn't believe him. Dosberto realizes Niko and Alexis have a plan.
episodes.title: Accidente de Max

episodes.synopsis: Dosberto has a plan against Max. Vale asks Manzana to join forces against Max; she agrees on one condition: that she be in charge of the operation.
episodes.title: Jefa de operaciones

episodes.synopsis: Max's ex-girlfriend is about to rat him out to everyone. Alexis and Niko are still planning how to get rid of Max. Vale realizes Max wants revenge.
episodes.title: Deseo de expulsión

episodes.synopsis: Rómulo wants Niko out of the school, and Valentina finds out. Leonora doesn't want Niko to leave GreenLand. Niko thinks Max put the pen in his locker.
episodes.title: Niko en problemas

episodes.synopsis: Vale wants to get the proof for Niko, so she visits Alexis to kiss him. Nats and Manzanita want to know all about the kiss between Val and Alexis.
episodes.title: Besando a Alexis

episodes.synopsis: Alexis and Leonora are sick of the band members and decide to stop being friends with them. Niko asks Leonora to get Rómulo to stop reading his email.
episodes.title: Adiós amistad

episodes.synopsis: Leonora quits as student advisor. Alexis is happy because Plan Chicken Pox is going perfectly. Rómulo finds out who stole his pen.
episodes.title: Plan complot varicela

episodes.synopsis: Catalina finds Niko in Val's room and asks what he's doing there. Eddy is tired of being the center of attention. Nats and Vale are still in the game.
episodes.title: No mas chico del año

episodes.synopsis: Eddy has a new business and he tells Dosberto about it. Leonora is sick of love. Niko and Valentina can't seem to get together. Val and Nats get mail.
episodes.title: Hartos del amor

episodes.synopsis: Lula tells Pato and Fabián she needs to talk to them, because she's decided who she's staying with. Richi asks Eddy for romantic advice.
episodes.title: Consejero del amor

episodes.synopsis: Vale's lies are revealed, and Alexis can't believe it. Nats thinks all those gifts are from Eddy trying to get her back. Val and Niko record an album.
episodes.title: Admirador secreto

episodes.synopsis: Eddy recommends Richi tell the girl how he feels about her. Vale hopes Niko stays with the group. Nats and Val are worried about Niko and Eddy.
episodes.title: Puntos en riesgo

episodes.synopsis: Eddy finds out Richi was putting the moves on Nats and confronts her for not telling him. Niko is upset after missing the band rehearsal.
episodes.title: Sorpresa y decepción

episodes.synopsis: It's time for Leonora to carry out her plan to sabotage the competition finale. Pato is trying to get word of her plans to the band.
episodes.title: Ganadora de Miss xv

episodes.synopsis: Val and Nats swear they didn't sabotage Cindy, saying she's their friend, and beg not to be disqualified. Pato confesses who was really responsible.
episodes.title: Ayuda de Pato

episodes.synopsis: The fate of the Miss XV competition and the winners will be revealed to the press. Luigi asks Niko to gather the group in the Miss XV offices.
episodes.title: Richi insistente

episodes.synopsis: Niko is tired of Catalina's mistreatment and abuse. Eddy assures Nats he'll stay on with the group but only until Cindy's party.
episodes.title: Sorpresa en internet

episodes.synopsis: Manzanita finds out Kike has the crown and she realizes he really is a thief just like Catalina said. Nats meets Eddy's new friends.
episodes.title: Plan de destrucción

episodes.synopsis: Vale is excited about EME-15's show. Niko is worried; he thinks no one cares about getting a chance to record an album as a group.
episodes.title: La música lo es todo

episodes.synopsis: Eddy is in trouble. Niko wants to tell Leonora, but he knows he could cause her trouble. Leonora asks Nats to help her organize a 15th birthday party.
episodes.title: Ayuda de amigas

episodes.synopsis: Alexis reminds Niko he's not in EME-15 anymore. Val is really desparate since Niko and Alexis won't stop fighting, so she asks Nats for help.
episodes.title: Grupo en pelea

episodes.synopsis: EME-15's big show is today. Eddy has his eyes on the prize. He tells Nats he knows this is his big chance.
episodes.title: Próxima boda

episodes.synopsis: Juana's wedding is about to be canceled. Pato asks his father for a favor. Eddy has a plan, but he'll need help from the Dosbis and the Pinkikis.
episodes.title: Plan indiscreto

episodes.synopsis: Nats and Miguel hope their plan will come together. Eddy is in big trouble and asks Valentina for help. Leonora has a plan to make Niko her boyfriend.
episodes.title: Problema gigantesco

episodes.synopsis: Alexis tells Niko he's going to hate him forever. Vale tells her family there's a crazy person following her around who knows everything about her.
episodes.title: Persecución

episodes.synopsis: Leonora wants to know if the crown is real. Pato tells Alexis Leonora is out of control and willing to tell what happened at Magic Dragon's wedding.
episodes.title: Princesa Valentina

episodes.synopsis: Pato gets a kiss from a girl. Alexis promises to pull one last prank, and Niko will know who's in charge. Niko asks Vale if she's really a princess.
episodes.title: Elecciones de princesa

episodes.synopsis: Prince Antonio never thought he would find love. Everyone makes fun of Niko, but he doesn't care about anything but recording an album.
episodes.title: Disco en puerta

episodes.synopsis: Niko confronts Prince Antonio and says the royalty thing is affecting Vale. Nats is really sad that Val is out of the group.
episodes.title: Tristeza de BFF

episodes.synopsis: Nats refuses to be won over again. Pato betrays Leonora to teach her to be a better person. Niko has an important message for Vale.
episodes.title: Traición de Pato

episodes.synopsis: Leonora won't let Niko go to Val's house. Prince Antonio asks Valentina to hurry up, the plane is about to leave. Vale heads off to Spain.
episodes.title: Viaje a España

episodes.synopsis: Leonora assures Nats that she'll take Vale's place at the 15th birthday party, because she's probably not coming back anytime soon. Alexis misses her.
episodes.title: Suplente

episodes.synopsis: Niko wants Vale to come back no matter who brings her back. Leonora wants the party to be just for her. Nats thinks Val won't show up on time.
episodes.title: Fiesta de XV

episodes.synopsis: The big day finally arrives and Vale has her party. Some leave with broken hearts, others with renewed love, and some begin a new era in their lives.
episodes.title: Gran final
